body: I think it can be written such that it is OK.  If `T1` and `T2` are Go types, and `v1` and `v2` are values of those types respectively, then `reflect.TypeOf(v1) == reflect.TypeOf(v2)` precisely when both `(interface{})(v1).(T1)` and `(interface{})(v1).(T2)` succeed (and the same type assertions also succeed for `v2`).
